sn51.1:1.1: “Mendicants, when these four bases of psychic power are developed and cultivated they lead to going from the near shore to the far shore.
sn51.1:1.3: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to enthusiasm, and active effort.
sn51.1:1.4: They develop the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to energy, and active effort.
sn51.1:1.5: They develop the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to mental development, and active effort.
sn51.1:1.6: They develop the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to inquiry, and active effort.
sn51.1:1.7: When these four bases of psychic power are developed and cultivated they lead to going from the near shore to the far shore.”
